definitions.definition: A conditional statement that includes a prediction in the dependent clause (e.g. "if it rains, the game will be cancelled", "give her an inch and she'll take a mile.").
Simulated data generated from a statistical model , based on the estimates for the real data.

main_definition: ( grammar ) A conditional statement that includes a prediction in the dependent clause (e.g. "if it rains, the game will be cancelled", "give her an inch and she'll take a mile.").
secondary_definitions: ( statistics ) Simulated data generated from a statistical model , based on the estimates for the real data.
